title: League Downloading at 40KB Per Second??
body:
I reinstalled league because there was an issue with the client size
Now I'm waiting for it to download but it's at 40KB ps?? Why? My internet isnt that bad. when I play a league game im usually on 30ms

https://gyazo.com/d58ac04dc927ef22c34d844b0866f60c

replies.body: It also may be worth while checking your firewall settings just to see if league is being blocked, even if it's only partially blocked

Sometimes your download speed during patching can fluctuate. I'd recommend just letting it run overnight if it starts hanging up like that again.

Let me know if you run into any errors!
